geometry.proportions: 1:1 square canvas, head and shoulders framing
geometry.element_arrangement: character centered, face as focal point with subtle environmental hints

composition.spatial_depth: soft background blur, character in sharp focus
composition.scale_consistency: consistent head size and framing across all avatars

lighting.type: soft natural daylight with warm fill
lighting.light_source: top-left key light, gentle fill from opposite side
lighting.shadow: soft facial shadows for depth, no harsh contrasts
lighting.highlighting: natural skin highlights, soft eye catchlights

character_rendering.facial_features: expressive but stylized, slightly larger eyes for warmth
character_rendering.skin_texture: soft realistic skin with subtle variation
character_rendering.hair: painterly with defined strands, natural movement

textures.surface_treatment: visible fabric weave, natural skin pores (subtle), realistic hair texture
textures.clothing_detail: clear material distinction (leather, cloth, metal) with soft rendering

render_quality.edge_definition: soft edges on background, defined but not harsh on character
render_quality.visual_clarity: recognizable at thumbnail size, detailed when enlarged

color_palette.range: richer than icon style, natural clothing and hair colors
color_palette.usage: harmonious palette per character, cohesive across full NPC set

background.color: soft gradient or subtle environment hint
background.style: blurred contextual setting matching character profession

icon_behavior.branding_alignment: fits cozy farming game but with more character depth
icon_behavior.personality: each NPC should feel unique and memorable
